name: Squeezer
tagline: Texture Packer for Game Development Using MaxRects Algorithm
body: Overview [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/huxingyi/squeezer.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/huxingyi/squeezer) ------------ **Texture Packer** for Game Development Using MaxRects Algorithm. *Note: The game assets used in this example were download from [Grassland Tileset](http://opengameart.org/content/grassland-tileset), thanks `Clint Bellanger` for made so many awesome game resources.* Building --------------- ```sh # Install ImageMagick via `brew install imagemagick` on Mac or visit http://imagemagick.org $ cd ./src $ export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/local/lib/pkgconfig $ make ``` Usage -------------- ```sh usage: squeezerw [options] options: --width --height --allowRotations <1/0/true/false/yes/no> --border <1/0/true/false/yes/no> --outputTexture --outputInfo --verbose --version ``` Example ------------ ```sh $ cd ./src $ export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/local/lib/pkgconfig $ make $ ./squeezerw ../example/images --verbose --width 512 --height 256 --border 1 --outputTexture ../example/squeezer.png --outputInfo ../example/squeezer.xml ``` Licensing ----------------- Licensed under the MIT license. References ------------ 1. http://www.blackpawn.com/texts/lightmaps/ 2. http://clb.demon.fi/projects/more-rectangle-bin-packing 3. http://wiki.unity3d.com/index.php?title=MaxRectsBinPack 4. https://github.com/juj/RectangleBinPack 5. http://opengameart.org/content/flare-weapon-icons-2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
